title: Kineo Essentials P101 Build v1.0
body: This release is aimed at developers who want to get involved with the Adapt Open Source initiative. Select a menu option below to find out more.

_ariaLabels.navigationDrawer: This is drawer which contains additional course resources. Select here to open.
_ariaLabels.accessibilityToggleButton: By selecting this button you can set whether accessibility is turned on or off

_ariaRegions.accordion: Accordion component - This component is an accordion comprised of collapsible content panels containing display text. Select the item titles to toggle the visibility of these content panels.
_ariaRegions.gmcq: This component is a graphical multiple choice question. You can only select one option. Once you have selected an option select the submit button below
_ariaRegions.graphic: This component just displays a graphic
_ariaRegions.hotGraphic: Below is a component which allows you to click on hot spots over an image. When you click on a hot spot you trigger a pop-up that includes an image with text. You can simply tab through the pop-up slides or close and select the next hot spot.
_ariaRegions.matching: This question component requires you to select the matching answer from a drop down list below. When you have selected your answers select the submit button
_ariaRegions.mcq: This component is a multiple choice question. Once you have selected an option select the submit button below
_ariaRegions.media: This is a media component which plays audio and video. To watch or listen click on play. Alternatively you can select the link below for the transcript.
_ariaRegions.narrative: This component displays an image gallery with accompanying text. Select the 'next' and 'previous' navigation controls to work through the narrative.
_ariaRegions.slider: This component requires you to answer the question by positioning a slider on a scale. Holding down the ALT key use the left and right keyboard arrows to position the slider. Then select the submit button below.
_ariaRegions.textInput: This question component requires you to type your answer in the textbox provided. When you have answered the question select the submit button below.
_ariaRegions.coverFlowMenuStart: Select here to enter course menu

_buttonAria.submitLabel: Select here to submit your answer.
_buttonAria.disabledLabel: Unavailable. This button will remain disabled until the question component is completed.

_pageLevelProgress._altText: of components completed on this page

_resources.title: Resources
_resources.description: Click here to view resources for this course

_resourcesItems.title: Adapt Learning YouTube Channel
_resourcesItems.description: Fancy catching up on some Adapt material

_resourcesItems.title: Community Site
_resourcesItems.description: Click here to view our community site

_quizProgressTutorButton.title: Revision Mode
_quizProgressTutorButton.body: The circle icons at the bottom of the screen will fill as you progress through the assessment. Once you’ve completed all the questions you’ll receive feedback on how you did.

_resultsTutorButton.title: Revision mode
_resultsTutorButton.body: Once you begin your revision, click on me again to see your progress

_certificateTutorButton.title: Revision mode
_certificateTutorButton.body: Click Back to Menu to go back to the menu or Print to print your certificate

_quitGuidedLearning.title: Leave revision mode
_quitGuidedLearning.body: Are you sure you would like to leave?

_quitCertificate.title: Leave Certificate
_quitCertificate.body: Are you sure you would like to leave?

_beforeCertificate.title: Congratulations!
_beforeCertificate.youScored: You have passed the assessment with a score of

_beforeRevision.title: Almost there!
_beforeRevision.body: You’ve completed the assessment, but you haven’t scored enough to pass just yet. Let’s see your score and what you need to revise.

_start.title: Welcome to your results
_start.body: %. Take a look at the revision plan we’ve drawn up for you below. It highlights the subjects that we recommend you review again so that you can have another go at the Test your knowledge assessment. To review the subjects, either select the Launch revision mode button at the bottom of the screen, or select the progress bar in the bottom right. Once you’ve reviewed a subject you’ll see that the flag icon in the revision plan will change to a book, showing that you’ve completed that subject.

_beginRevision.title: Ready to revise?
_beginRevision.body: We’re about to take you on a guided learning journey through the course. Complete the components that appear in view, then select Next to move on to the next one. Alternatively, move through the components in the order you wish by choosing them from the progress bar. You can select the mortarboard icon to move back to the results panel at any point, or, if you want to stop revising, select Quit revision mode.

_endRevision.title: Time to try again
_endRevision.body: Now you’ve completed revision mode we’ll take you back to the randomised questions so you can retake the assessment.

_search.description: Type in search words and enter

_bookmarking.title: Bookmarking
_bookmarking.message: Whould you like to continue where you left off?
